	}

		limit = { has_flag = deaf_aa }
		clr_flag = deaf_aa
		set_flag = de_aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_BB }
		clr_flag = deaf_BB
		set_flag = de_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_Bb }
		clr_flag = deaf_Bb
		set_flag = de_Bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_bb }
		clr_flag = deaf_bb
		set_flag = de_bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_CC }
		clr_flag = deaf_CC
		set_flag = de_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_Cc }
		clr_flag = deaf_Cc
		set_flag = de_Cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_cc }
		clr_flag = deaf_cc
		set_flag = de_cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_AA }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_AA
		set_flag = w_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_Aa }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_Aa
		set_flag = w_Aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_aa }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_aa
		set_flag = w_aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_BB }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_BB
		set_flag = w_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_Bb }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_Bb
		set_flag = w_Bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_bb }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_bb
		set_flag = w_bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_CC }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_CC
		set_flag = w_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_Cc }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_Cc
		set_flag = w_Cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_cc }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_cc
		set_flag = w_cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_AA }
		clr_flag = perc_AA
		set_flag = p_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_Aa }
		clr_flag = perc_Aa
		set_flag = p_Aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_aa }
		clr_flag = perc_aa
		set_flag = p_aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_BB }
		clr_flag = perc_BB
		set_flag = p_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_Bb }
		clr_flag = perc_Bb
		set_flag = p_Bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_bb }
		clr_flag = perc_bb
		set_flag = p_bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_CC }
		clr_flag = perc_CC
		set_flag = p_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_Cc }
		clr_flag = perc_Cc
		set_flag = p_Cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_cc }
		clr_flag = perc_cc
		set_flag = p_cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_AA }
		clr_flag = health_AA
		set_flag = hl_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_Aa }
		clr_flag = health_Aa
		set_flag = hl_Aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_aa }
		clr_flag = health_aa
		set_flag = hl_aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_BB }
		clr_flag = health_BB
		set_flag = hl_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_Bb }
		clr_flag = health_Bb
		set_flag = hl_Bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_bb }
		clr_flag = health_bb
		set_flag = hl_bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_CC }
		clr_flag = health_CC
		set_flag = hl_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_Cc }
		clr_flag = health_Cc
		set_flag = hl_Cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = health_cc }
		clr_flag = health_cc
		set_flag = hl_cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_AA }
		clr_flag = handedness_AA
		set_flag = lh_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_Aa }
		clr_flag = handedness_Aa
		set_flag = lh_Aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_aa }
		clr_flag = handedness_aa
		set_flag = lh_aa
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_BB }
		clr_flag = handedness_BB
		set_flag = lh_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_Bb }
		clr_flag = handedness_Bb
		set_flag = lh_Bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_bb }
		clr_flag = handedness_bb
		set_flag = lh_bb
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_CC }
		clr_flag = handedness_CC
		set_flag = lh_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_Cc }
		clr_flag = handedness_Cc
		set_flag = lh_Cc
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = handedness_cc }
		clr_flag = handedness_cc
		set_flag = lh_cc
	}
}
